title: OptiMantra
description: Leading online Practice Management, EHR and EMR software for Integrative Practitioners - Acupuncture, Chiropractors, Naturopaths, TCM, Massage Therapists, Nurse Practitioners, Doctors
cleaned_text: Online Booking Automated Reminders Two-way and Group Texting* Group Emails Custom Templates and Questionnaires Customizable Charting Custom Compounding, IVs, and Tinctures Telehealth / Secure, HIPAA-compliant Video Chat Prescriptions* and Electronic Labs Patient Portal and Messaging Superbills and Package Management Point of Sale and Integrated Payments Fully Integrated Insurance Billing* Basic Data Import and Customizations Email and Phone Support HIPAA and PHIPA Compliance
